title: What is Zibit?
description: A guided walkthrough of the philosophy behind Zibit and its features structured like a course

contentBlocks.title: Animations
contentBlocks.text: Zibit animations are similar to video lectures but allow students to pause and explore for themselves

contentBlocks.title: Labs
contentBlocks.text: Interactive labs let students to collect data in real time using their webcam, microphone, or external data collection devices that can be added in the future

contentBlocks.title: Concept Checks
contentBlocks.text: At every step along the way students check their understanding and can go back to fill any gaps so they are never lost

contentBlocks.title: A Learning Ecosystem
contentBlocks.text: Zibit finds deficincies in the studen't learning and adapts the curiculum to fill in the gaps
